column4: Has anyone else problems with CPU usage in 7.10? Mine is between 50-75% and i only got sys monitor,gnome, gmail notify and pidgin running
i have issues with CPU usage
i have no idea why, i think it has to do with my kernel though
perhaps it's just a bug - my cpu usage is ~90%, but temperatures are fairly cool and cpu utilization is on 45%(Cool'N'Quiet)
